entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Startup activation of singletons #86075
  • Official build fails due to missing windows_arm job #86073
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Argument out of range in MetadataFieldLayoutAlgorithm.ComputeSequentialFieldLayout #86044
  • [browser][non-icu] IDN/ACE mapping in `HybridGlobalization` #86041
  • [Mono] Implement support for UnsafeAccesorAttribute #86040
    8.0.0
  • [browser][mt] Release all proxies of C# and JS objects #86039
    8.0.0
  • [browser] Top-level await promise never resolved #86037
    8.0.0
  • Trim Analyzer doesn't handle annotations on inferred generic arguments #86032
  • System.Text.Json deserialisation does not respect "required" keyword when used in base class #86031
    8.0.0
  • Invalid ROL/ROR logic when accessing array element on x86 #86027

Closed

  • [wasm] AOT perf runs, and library tests are failing due to `src/mono/mono/mini/aot-compiler.c:10110` #86052
    8.0.0
  • Extent of reflection-related impact around function pointers? #86063
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ArgumentException helper methods #77749
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: #86067
  • The working directory log message on app startup #85809
    8.0.0
  • Could not find chrome snapshot folder for Linux_x64 #85949
    8.0.0
  • Support HttpClientHandler.Proxy on iOS #86061
  • System.Text.Json deserializer throws JsonException on `ImmutableSortedSet<Version?>` with a null element #85981
    8.0.0
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Support `PreserveSig` on methods #85816
    8.0.0
  • [High Memory] Consumed approximately 300MB of additional memory with latest runtime docker image 6.0.16 #85924
    8.0.0
  • EntryPointNotFoundException throwns in action #85990
  • BigInteger.Parse creates invalid instances from hex strings #74758
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions.PropertyNameCaseInsensitive does not apply to JsonPolymorphismOptions.TypeDiscriminatorPropertyName #86028
  • Deserialising null to JsonNode in nested structures fails in System.Text.Json #85172
    Future
  • System.Text.Json serializer throws NullReferenceException on `List<Version?>` with a null element #85983
  • [MSVC] CoreCLR failed to build due to error C2280 and C2088 with option /std:c++20 #85864
    8.0.0
  • Test failure Interop\\NativeLibrary\\API\\NativeLibraryTests\\NativeLibraryTests.cmd #84914
    8.0.0
  • HttpClient Timeout in Docker, http endpoint (not https) #86005
  • Digital marketing strategy for MIS. #86030
  • [Hanging test] System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicListenerTests.AcceptConnectionAsync_ThrowingOptionsCallback_Throws #86006
  • JIT: Reconsider how stress modes are randomly applied #83733
    Future
  • Blazor WebAssembly AOT condition `table_size < 65000' not met #85917
  • [mono] "opcode 940 load_gotaddr" error when AOTing on android-x86 #85724
    8.0.0
  • Ensure exception count metric is thread-safe #85997
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Support ConfigurationBinder.GetValue in source-gen #86076
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Fix official build after removing win-arm runtime build #86074
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add integration tests for PreserveSig and use the MemberFunction calling convention by default in the ComInterfaceGenerator #86072
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] Fix the emission of nonnull metadata on loads. #86071
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • FIx SequenceReader Rewind(0) state corruption #86070
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • Read public GC options if available #86068
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ensure DecomposeRotate correctly orders parameters. #86066
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete Windows arm32 support #86065
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Show method names in JitDisasm #86060
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add necessary subset of wide char APIs to minipal #86055
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Upgrade gcc CI to use gcc13 #86051
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Another attempt to prevent stripping exported symbols from executables when explicitly specified #86050
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] Fix fingerprinting of relinked dotnet.js during build #86048
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • add AllowTlsResume to SslStream options #86047
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Reduce overhead of calling into SearchValues #86046
    area-System.Buffers, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Add a pass of liveness for the new locals inside physical promotion #86043
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] marshal-ilgen is dropped when not required #86035
    NO-MERGE, needs-area-label
  • Make casting helpers look more like in CoreCLR #86029
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Write generic method, write complex signatures like array/pointer/generics #86026
    area-System.Reflection
  • [wasm] Disable the PackedSimd.Shuffle intrinsic. #86025
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Enable the "TC_QuickJitForLoops" on LoongArch64. #86022
    community-contribution, needs-area-label

Merged

  • [mono][aot] Fix an assert. #86054
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add linux-x64 hosted tpdiff to superpmi-diffs pipeline #86021
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Add arm64 dynamic pgo runs #86014
    area-Infrastructure
  • ILLink should keep parameter names for methods which are used to create a delagate #85831
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Add ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrWhiteSpace #86007
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Capture remaining binding Bind & Get methods for source generator support #85843
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Update linux build instructions #86062
    needs-area-label
  • Fix BigInteger parse hex strings on negative numbers #84792
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Revert "let user know working directory will be used as content root path by default (#82445) #86057
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Fix null handling of built-in converters #86056
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add PreserveSig support to ComInterfaceGenerator #85941
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix NativeLibraryTests for ilasm round-trip #85991
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Update mariner images to latest with LLVM 16 #84676
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove Windows arm32 support #85947
    area-Infrastructure
  • Disable autovectorization on wasm #86038
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Expose various integer intrinsics for Avx512F, Avx512BW, and Avx512CD #85833
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [docs] Add instructions for running the runtime tests on iOS platforms #86045
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • fix JsonNode deserialising from null #85463
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix mismatched types in native host test error messaging #85995
    area-Host
  • JIT: Seed stress modes by string hash #83771
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Peel offsets from spilled addresses for store decomposition #85889
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable HugeArray1 for crossgen2 x86 #86020
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Allow set GC configuration in NativeAOT #85921
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Misc LSRA throughput improvements #85842
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete rarely used bashing methods and add some documentation on bashing #85925
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add aka.ms link for NativeAOT prerequisites to linker not found error messages #86024
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Avoid an assert if the class name table is too large. #85952
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Fix an assert. #85950
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Dedup PemEncoding.TryCountBase64 with Base64.IsValid #86002
    area-System.Security
  • Make exception count performance counter thread-safe #86018
    area-System.Threading
  • JIT/EE interface cleanup #85975
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create a createdump static library for single-file dump generation #84864
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • Templatize `enregisterLocalVars` in various methods of LSRA #85144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Interface inheritance follow up #85117
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Intrinsics analyzer and fixes #85481
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector256.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [JIT]: Inline TLS field access for GC type #85619
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Enable v128 and wasm packedsimd in the interpreter #85920
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Enabling RuntimeEventSource in NativeAOT #85424
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] X64 - Centralize peephole optimization for removing redundant `mov` instructions #85780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] amend the crossgen2/r2rdump for LA64. #85038
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] [browser] fix job queue timespan calculation #85784
    Servicing-consider, area-Threading-mono, 7.0.x
  • feat(83547): Adding escaping of property name for GetPath. #84688
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [wasm] Webcil-in-WebAssembly #85932
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Add message details for AmbiguousMatchException #84512
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Clean up dead code in illink targets #85741
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Trigger relinking if WasmNativeStrip=false #85857
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Optimizations for Ascii.Equals and Ascii.EqualsIgnoreCase #85926
    area-System.Text.Encoding, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Enabling AOT wrappers for virtual delegates #85643
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Remove generated locals in RegexCompiler.LoadSearchValues #86010
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [Mono] Add mono hot reload support for updating parameter name #85796
    area-EnC-mono
  • [API Proposal]: Add overload for EventSource primitives #83751
    api-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Add version info to NativeAOT Unix apps #79623
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] loader #85730
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Constrained mask should take into account busy registers #85933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix(76268): Fix invalid behavior for ignored properties with "new" mo… #84756
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Make host look for RID-specific assets via a known list by default #84100
    breaking-change, area-Host, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • JIT: Fold typeof(T).TypeHandle.Value #85804
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move assignment rationalization to before forward substitution #86004
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add Native AOT iOS perf scenarios #85317
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement compare native function #85965
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • [debugger] Fix MDBGPROT_CMD_TYPE_ELEMENT_TYPE behavior #85679
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Restore missing API from Extensions #85846
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Add tests for RUC warnings on override methods #86015
    test-enhancement, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Deduplicate runtime invoke wrappers on iOS #85908
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Change IsolatedStorageFile path for mobile #83380
    area-System.IO, os-android, os-ios
  • Unify parsing part of BigInteger with CoreLib #85978
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Release/6.0] Port EventCounters multi session support to 6.0 #84680
    Servicing-approved, breaking-change, area-Tracing-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 6.0.18
  • [Release/7.0] Port EventCounters multi session support to 7.0 #84679
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.7
  • Add ToDictionary() overloads for KeyValuePair and ValueTuple kv. #85811
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet workload install does not support verbosity flag #32404

Closed

  • Resolving of FrameworkReference is inconsistent if the framework dll also has a NuGet-Package #32406
  • dotnet new globaljson causes MSB4236: Microsoft.DOtNet.Arcade.Sdk could not be found #24085
    Discussion
  • [release/3.1] Tests will fail when testing 2.1 with a stage0 #12558
  • There is a directory /.dotnet #12544
  • Running tests with coverage + signed assembly + Directory.Build.props fail on NET5 preview6 #12309

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32430
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add warning for optional workload EOL #32426
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [draft][release/7.0.4xx] removed restriction on Publish SDK to allow publishing non-web project #32422
    Area-Containers

Merged

  • [Own build] Don't use AssemblyInformationCachePaths #32355
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clarifying .NET version in test #32131
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32338
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2177895 #32408
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add known TFMs to multitarget-publish error message #32333
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #32390
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix the NETSDK1094 errors #32058
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove duplicate packages #32347
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #32339
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #32343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add PackageReference to new Roslyn package #29787
    Area-ILLink
  • Handle Uri-less Realms during basic auth, and fix auth lookups for hosts with ports specified #32371
    Area-Containers
  • Update dependabot to run on 4xx #31837
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • support correct property name and ensure compat with old name #32085
    Area-Containers
  • Container Build: multiple registry push, single archive for multiple tags, tar.gz file writing. #32132
    Area-Containers
  • [release/7.0.3xx] added `Microsoft.DotNet.Cli.Utils.dll` to package content #32375
    Servicing-consider, Area-Containers
  • Make GeneratePublishDependencyFile incremental #32305
    untriaged, Area-ILLink

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-10

Issues

Updated

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update README.md #7186
  • Update breaking-change-warnings.md #7184
  • Create breaking-change-warnings.md #7182

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Multiple "CodeStatements" for "CodeDom.CodeIterationStatement.IncrementStatement" possible? #68159
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.* trimming support #68154
    17.7
  • BUG: Expression is always false #68153

Closed

  • Roslyn IDE is flagging Enum objects in a inheriting c# files as an error. #67764
    17.7
  • Pattern-captured variable has a wrong value in C# 11 #67923
    17.7
  • Required Members VB Support #61435
    17.7
  • CS8602 in child class when in the construtor ensures the value of base class property won't be null #65753
    17.7
  • Remove the ` bool IsUnsafe(this TypeSymbol type)` method #67330
    17.7
  • Source Generators support AddSource with SyntaxNode for possible future perf improvements #68155
  • IDE1006 should not warn when name is all underscores #40713
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33709.525 #68152

PullRequests

Created

  • Enabled .NET remote host by default #68161
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add RequiresNonDocumentChangesTag to ProjectOptionsChangeAction #68160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pack bits in SourceOrdinaryMethodSymbol into an existing bitflag structure we have for all source methods #68158
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Limit amount of tokens used to calculate LCS distance #68151
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #68149
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • IDE1006: Support multiple underscores #68086
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Feature - IDE1006, Next
  • Check if DocCookie is int instead of uint #68105
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • LSP.Range may request beyond length of file #68081
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Revert "Pack bits in SourceOrdinaryMethodSymbol into an existing bitflag structure we have for all source methods" #68157
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Make existing instance methods on BindingDiagnosticBag into extensions #68043
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove the ` bool IsUnsafe(this TypeSymbol type)` method #67831
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Pack bits in SourceOrdinaryMethodSymbol into an existing bitflag structure we have for all source methods #68132
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove redundant hex digit validator from lexer #68016
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #68150
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Add feature to help people move to using primary constructors. #68147
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Initial support for collection literal spread elements #67942
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement member lookup for extension types #68137
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Implement more validation for inline array element access and conversion scenarios #68146
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Remove CS1701 and CS1702 warnings #66313
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Record added node output states as new #66725
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Remove specialized C# and VB subtypes of BindingDiagnosticBag #68044
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use a singleton sentinel for empty type-parameters for non-generic named-types and methods. #68131
    Area-Compilers
  • Add FilterTree/FilterSpan API on remaining analysis contexts #68052
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Performance-Scenario-Diagnostics
  • Report only warning for `ref` argument at `in` parameter #68087
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrWhitespace #48185
  • add HelpUriLinks for generator errors #48184
  • Links are broken for published Blazor WebAssembly project on GitHub pages #48183
  • Provide a hosting model agnostic way of getting the current environemnt #48181
  • [Analyzer] : Warn when registering custom IProblemDetailsWriter after calling AddRazorPages, etc #48180
  • Perf improvement: json, mapaction, mvc #48177
  • Dependency Injected pooled instances #48172
  • W3CLogging Bug - Not Working as Documented #48170
  • Blazor WASM memory keep on increasing, GC not working as expected #48166
  • AddSession Sets wrong Cookie Path #48165
  • Better error log for: "No .NET call dispatcher has been set." #48164
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, single_query #48160
  • SignalR Onconnected when using Hubs with Websockets #48158
  • Update route analyzer to use FilterSpan when it's available #48157
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Analyzer] : Warn when registering custom IProblemDetailsWriter after calling AddRazorPages, etc #48178
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, plaintext #48112
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, plaintext #48116
  • Perf regression: json #48161
  • Routing: DfaMatcher match error when literal constrain appears twice in the path segment #47587
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Getting signed out on live site after AppPool recycle #48049
  • The RAM memory remains full even if the object is no longer used #48145
  • Upgrade spa-templates client apps to yaml 2.2 #47975
    8.0-preview5
  • Handle browser cache for static files after deploying new code in Blazor WASM #48143
  • Razor pages with smooth DOM updates using ajax calls and websockets #48159
  • EntityFrameworkCore 7 Appears during migration ：Ad hoc updates to the system directory are not allowed #48162
  • RoutePatternAnalyzer causes stack overflow on C# file with a lot of string operations #48097
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Consider in-repo documentation for diagnostic codes used in repo #47287
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove remaining use of legacy interop in Blazor WebAssembly #48182
    area-blazor
  • Pin M.CA dependency versions used in RDG #48179
    area-infrastructure, feature-rdg
  • Create index.aspx #48167
    community-contribution, needs-area-label

Merged

  • Reduce first chance ODEs in SocketConnection.DoReceive() #48176
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview5
  • [skip-ci]Update list-of-diagnostics.md #48169
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Use Node 18 (LTS) #48087
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • http.sys: short-circuit empty writes (if we've started) #48071
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview5
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2176883 #48152
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview5
  • Fix StackOverflowException in RoutePatternAnalyzer #48105
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview5
  • Documentation for diagnostic codes used in repo #48151
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Replace ISystemClock with TimeProvider in Kestrel #48081
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel
  • Add IAcceptsMetadata to RDG #47942
    area-runtime, feature-rdg
  • Unified app model routing #47759
    area-blazor
  • Code Fix for AfterOnResourceExecution Diagnostic Event. #48077
    area-mvc, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Ensure DataProtection can be used in trimmed apps. #48082
    area-dataprotection
  • Uses Fallback When Without Repository #48103
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution
  • Update version of Microsoft.Identity.Web and Microsoft.Identity.Web.UI to 2.7.0 #47906
    area-infrastructure, area-identity, pending-ci-rerun
  • Improve endpoint metadata debugging #47163
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Skip counter measurement when start listening while processing #48045
    area-runtime, area-signalr
  • Add initial support for parameters with `AsParameters` attribute #47914
    area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Post-Mortem Native and Managed Heap Diagnostics Improvements #3736
    8.0.0

Updated

  • `dumpgen gen0` makes analyze exit with an exit code of 139 on Linux #3842
  • User Story: Cloud Native developers have the tools to be able to collect traces and dumps in container environments and perform 1st level analysis on them #3761
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix issue with nint/nuint formatting #3871
  • Add static variable names to !gcroot #3872

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Crash on show dialog after back from background #15024
  • Image shadow is away from the photo on horizontal screen rotation #15023
  • Clean install: still getting Platform version is not present for one or more target frameworks, #15021
  • Slider StepWidth Property #15019
    Backlog
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Grid issue with calculating * values on iOS/MacCatalyst #15018
    Backlog
  • [Windows] Flyout Shell Content title is not broken over multiple lines. #15017
    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Will Microsoft.EntityFramework.Sqlite have speed improvements in net 8 #30870
  • Interceptor support for bulk updates #30869
    Backlog
  • MAUI Android app crash with Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite >= 6.0.12 #30867
  • Add $type to jsonb if decorated with JsonDerivedTypeAttribute #30865

Closed

  • Model compiler fails to include namespace in generated code #30857
  • Using ExecuteUpdateAsync with owned entity throws exception #30860
  • GenerateCreateScript doesn't return SQL for creating views #30854
  • enable-migrations fails -target project doesn't reference EntityFramework #30802
  • EF Core Not updating Id value of new entity saved in db. #30868
  • SQLite RevEng: Sample data to determine CLR type #8824
    8.0.0
  • Sentinel not generated for enums on Optimize-DbContext #30832
    8.0.0
  • EntityFrameworkCore 7 Appears during migration ：Ad hoc updates to the system directory are not allowed #30866
  • Reliability on getting generated ID of inserted items using C# 9 immutable records as models #30837
  • Query in json column and return parent #30834
  • EF CORE 7.0 TPC Not Creating Foreign Key #30807
  • Dynamically generated expression predicates throw InvalidOperationException #30799
  • Winui Database.Migrate() does not create new database if it does not already exist #30797
  • Using postgres enum types generates migration files that depends on the clr enum type #30796
  • Unable to run dotnet ef migration add on debian 10 #30795
  • Non-nullabe Int foreign key, "defaultvalue : 0" when AddColumn. #30759
  • WinUI 3 Scaffold-DbContext error #30758
  • Getting Database Results from EF core #30702
  • Extremely large memory consumption in "ToListAsync()" when using cancellation token #30691

PullRequests

Merged

  • SQLite Scaffolding: Use column type and values to provide a better CLR type #30816
  • Handle enum literals that are not a defined value of the enum #30852
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.1.1 to 8.1.2 #30848
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
